original: sgyu ma'i nags tshal mang po de dang der //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i nags tshal mang po de dang der //
translated: In that and that illusory forest

original: ri dags gsad phyir blon po do mbi 'gro //
analyzed: ri dags gsad phyir blon po do mbi 'gro //
translated: The minister Dombī goes to kill the deer.

original: log 'gro ri dgas gar 'gro nga yis mthong //
analyzed: log 'gro ri dgas gar 'gro nga yis mthong //
translated: I see where the deer of wrong views goes.

original: do mbi mda' rnon bkang nas nang du zhugs //
analyzed: do mbi mda' rnon bkang nas nang du zhugs //
translated: Dombī enters, his sharp arrow drawn.

original: mda' lnga yod de lnga ka shar gyis bton //
analyzed: mda' lnga yod de lnga ka shar gyis bton //
translated: There are five arrows, all drawn to the full.

original: do mbi gzhu ba kang gzung nas rnam par 'dug //
analyzed: do mbi gzhu ba kang gzung nas rnam par 'dug //
translated: Dombī stands there, his bow drawn.

original: log lta'i ri dags gar 'gro nga yis mthong //
analyzed: log lta'i ri dags gar 'gro nga yis mthong //
translated: I see where the deer of wrong views goes.

original: do mbi mda' rnon bkang nas nang du zhugs //
analyzed: do mbi mda' rnon bkang nas nang du zhugs //
translated: Dombī enters, his sharp arrow drawn.

original: gzhu med rgyud med smyug med mde'u med //
analyzed: gzhu med rgyud med smyug med mde'u med //
translated: No bow, no string, no bamboo, no arrowhead.

original: dombi the tshom med de nges par bsad //
analyzed: dombi the tshom med de nges par bsad //
translated: Dombī is certain, without doubt, that he will kill.

original: log lta'i ri dags gar 'gro nga yis mthong //
analyzed: log lta'i ri dags gar 'gro nga yis mthong //
translated: I see where the deer of wrong views goes.

original: do mbi mda' rnon bkang nas nang du zhugs //
analyzed: do mbi mda' rnon bkang nas nang du zhugs //
translated: Dombī enters, his sharp arrow drawn.

original: rgyal ba rigs lnga dbu rgyan byas nas su //
analyzed: rgyal ba rigs lnga dbu rgyan byas nas su //
translated: Having crowned himself with the crown of the five victorious buddha families,

original: ri dgas bdag pa slar la so sa par bya //
analyzed: ri dgas bdag pa slar la so sa par bya //
translated: he will be the lord of the deer.

original: log lta'i ri dgas gag 'grong yis mthong //
analyzed: log lta'i ri dgas gag 'grong yis mthong //
translated: I see where the deer of wrong views goes.

original: do mbi mnga' rnon bkang nas nang du zhugs //
analyzed: do mbi mnga' rnon bkang nas nang du zhugs //
translated: and filled the interior with the sharp arrows of the Doma.
The song of Doma is finished.
